thread.title: Joey Barton claims N'Golo Kante is overrated: ''He's a fantastic destroyer - but not a creator''
thread.title_full: Joey Barton claims N'Golo Kante is overrated: ''He's a fantastic destroyer - but not a creator''

author: Darren Lewis
title: Joey Barton claims N'Golo Kante is overrated: ''He's a fantastic destroyer - but not a creator''
text:
Kante was labelled the best midfielder in the world by Frank Lampard (Photo: PA) Share Get Chelsea FC   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Joey Barton claims Chelsea’s N’Golo Kante is overrated. 
The France midfielder, 25, has been showered with praise for helping Leicester to their shock title win last season and inspiring the Chelsea to the brink this time around. 
But Barton, whose Burnley team held Chelsea to a 1-1 draw last month, says: “At the moment, in England, people only swear by N’Golo Kante. It’s the fashion. 
“For pundits, he’s the best midfielder in the world. Oh! He’s very good, but I played against him three weeks ago, and that’s not the case. 
“He’s a fantastic destroyer in a phenomenal team, but not a creator.” Barton has rubbished suggestions Kante is the world's best (Photo: Mark Robinson) Kante looks set to win back-to-back league titles (Photo: REUTERS) 
It was Chelsea legend Frank Lampard who labelled Kante the best in the world after his FA Cup quarter-final winner against Manchester United two weeks ago. 
He said: “I'd go as far to say that he's the best central midfield player in the world." 
And Chelsea winger Eden Hazard claimed Kante’s work-rate is so high it is like playing with twins. 
Kante, a £30million capture for Chelsea last summer, has been a key figure in helping Antonio Conte’s side to a commanding advantage in the title race. 
But Barton believes it will only be once the Frenchman plays in the Champions League next that he can be correctly assessed in relation to other superstars in his position around the world. 
Barton has made 13 appearances for Burnley this season, scoring once and picking up six yellow cards. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
